original_title: Sri Lanka bonds closes steady, rupee 326.75/328.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 326.75/328.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed steady at 15.90/16.00 after opening at 15.85/00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 closed steady at 15.10/15.15 after opening at 15.05/15.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed steady 13.40/45 after opening at 13.40/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed steady at 14.40/70 after opening at 14.30/15.50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed steady at 15.10/25 after opening at 15.00/15.12 percent.  (Colombo/July19/2023)
